articles.title: Biologists Just Totally Proved Wrong a Long-Standing Rumor About Sharks - ScienceAlert
articles.description: It's been rumored that sharks don't sleep at all; the fact some sharks must stay on the move to facilitate their breathing has contributed to this idea.
articles.content:

articles.author: Mark Waghorn
articles.title: Ten-armed squid thought to be 328 million years old named after Joe Biden - The Independent
articles.description: Syllipsimopodi bideni was armed with two more limbs than its descendants today and roamed the oceans 328 million years ago
articles.content:
A prehistoric squid with ten arms has been named after US President Joe Biden. The creature is the oldest ancestor of cephalopods, which also include octopuses.

articles.title: Planet forming 444 light years away contains large organic molecule - Daily Mail
articles.description: Astronomers discovered the chemical, known as dimethyl ether, a key building block of life, inside the planet forming disk around the young star IRS 48.
articles.content:
A ring of dust, gas and ice 444 light years from the Earth has been found to contain a large organic molecule, that could one day go on to form life.
